alert.delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This will immediately remove all your data and preferences from this device and sign you out.
alert.delete.title: Delete Account

calories.added.title: Sport Calories Added
calories.invalid.msg: Please enter a valid number of calories burned.

camera.unavailable.msg: Your device does not have a camera.

disc.accuracy.text: Nutritional estimates are based on visual analysis and may not be completely accurate. Actual nutritional content may vary based on preparation methods, portion sizes, and ingredient variations.
disc.feature.calories: • Calorie Tracking: Estimates based on visual food analysis
disc.feature.limits: • Calorie Limits: Default values or personalized calculations based on health data
disc.feature.macros: • Nutritional Analysis: Macronutrient breakdown using AI image recognition
disc.feature.plans: • Personalized Plans: Optional BMR-based calorie recommendations using user health data
disc.feature.recommendations: • Dietary Recommendations: General suggestions based on nutritional guidelines
disc.feature.weight: • Weight Tracking: User-input data for personal monitoring
disc.medical.text: Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider before making any changes to your diet or nutrition plan, especially if you have medical conditions, allergies, or dietary restrictions.
disc.notice.text: This app provides general nutritional information and dietary suggestions for educational purposes only. The information is not intended to replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
disc.title: Health Information Disclaimer
error.food.msg: Nismo mogli identificirati hranu na vašoj fotografiji. Molimo pokušajte napraviti drugu fotografiju s boljim osvjetljenjem i uvjerite se da je hrana jasno vidljiva.
error.food.title: Hrana Nije Prepoznata
error.scale.msg:
Nismo mogli pročitati vašu vagu. Molimo uvjerite se da:
• Zaslon vage prikazuje jasan broj
• Osvjetljenje je dobro
• Vaga je na ravnoj površini
• Fotografirajte izravno s prednje strane
error.scale.title: Vaga Nije Prepoznata

limits.invalid_input_msg: Unesite valjane pozitivne brojeve. Meka granica mora biti ≤ tvrde granice.
limits.msg:
Postavite dnevne granice kalorija ručno ili koristite izračun temeljen na zdravstvenim podacima.

⚠️ Opće smjernice. Za osobni savjet obratite se stručnjaku.

onboarding.alcohol.desc: Pogledajte povijest u kalendaru; boja čaše pokazuje svježinu.
onboarding.alcohol.title: Praćenje alkohola 🍷
onboarding.complete.desc: Spremni za početak? Vodič je uvijek u postavkama.
onboarding.complete.title: Sve spremno! 🎉
onboarding.datamode.desc: Pick how much detail you want to see. You can change this later in your profile.
onboarding.datamode.title: Choose Your Data Mode 📈
onboarding.disclaimer.desc: Aplikacija ne zamjenjuje liječnički savjet. Obratite se stručnjaku.
onboarding.disclaimer.title: Važno zdravstveno upozorenje ⚠️
onboarding.friends.desc: Dodajte prijatelje i dijelite s popisa; odaberite udio.
onboarding.friends.title: Dijelite obroke s prijateljima 🤝
onboarding.health_form.desc: Unesite osnovne podatke za personalizirane preporuke.
onboarding.health_form.title: Vaši zdravstveni podaci 📝
onboarding.health_results.desc: Prema podacima — preporuke za optimalno zdravlje.
onboarding.health_results.title: Vaš personalizirani plan 🎯
onboarding.health_setup.title: Personalizirana postavka zdravlja 📋
onboarding.insights.desc: Trendovi, profil i zdravlje — za vaše ciljeve.
onboarding.insights.title: Personalizirani uvidi 💡
onboarding.language.desc: Odaberite željeni jezik. Možete ga promijeniti kasnije u tutorialu.
onboarding.language.title: Odaberi jezik 🌐
onboarding.notifications.desc: Enable reminders to snap your meals: breakfast (by 12), lunch (by 17), and dinner (by 21). We'll only remind you if you haven't snapped food yet. You can change this later in settings.
onboarding.notifications.title: Stay on Track with Gentle Reminders ⏰
onboarding.recognition.desc: Slikajte hranu — AI je prepoznaje i bilježi kalorije automatski.
onboarding.recognition.title: Pametno prepoznavanje hrane 📸
onboarding.skip.message: Uvijek možete pristupiti ovom vodiču kasnije iz postavki profila.
onboarding.skip.title: Preskočiti uvod?
onboarding.tracking.desc: Dnevne kalorije i težina — sve automatizirano!
onboarding.tracking.title: Pratite napredak 📊
onboarding.welcome.desc: Vaš pametni prehrambeni pratitelj: pratite kalorije, težinu i birajte zdravije. Krenimo u kratki vodič!
onboarding.welcome.title: Dobrodošli u Eateria! 🍎
